title: Korea, Vietnam joint photo exhibition connects through 'affection' (Ministry of Culture, Sports And Tourism of ...
text: ( Source : Ministry of Culture , Sports And Tourism of the Republic of Korea ) The Korean Cultural Center in Vietnam ( KCCV ) opened a joint photo exhibition on Oct. 15. The topic was landscapes and cultures as seen by both Koreans and
